## Example

```{r}
library(JuliaFormulae)
```

```{r}
julia_formula(y ~ a + I(a^2) + b + a:b  + (a || g) + (b | g))
```

## Supported conversions

- Zero correlation: `(term || group)` -> `zerocorr()`
- Protection: e.g., `I(term^2)` -> `protect(term^2)`
- Interaction terms: `a:b` -> `a&b`
